name: Sequence Diagram
advanced_puml:
@startuml
title Sequence Diagram (advanced features)
skinparam backgroundColor #FFFFFF
skinparam sequence {
  ArrowColor #1F6FEB
  LifeLineBorderColor #444444
  LifeLineBackgroundColor #F6F8FA
  ParticipantBorderColor #24292F
  ParticipantBackgroundColor #EAEEF2
  BoxBorderColor #57606A
  BoxBackgroundColor #F6F8FA
}
autonumber 

box "Client" #E7F5FF
participant "Web UI" as Web
end box

box "Server" #FFF5E6
participant API
database "Orders DB" as DB
end box

Web -> API ++ : POST /orders Content-Type: json
API -> DB ++ : INSERT order
DB --> API -- : ok

alt Payment fails
  API -[#D1242F]> Web -- : 402 Payment Required
else Success
  API -[#2DA44E]> Web -- : 201 Created Location: /orders/123
end

note right of API #FFF8C5
  Demonstrates:!!BR!!- boxes!!BR!!- autonumber!!BR!!- colors!!BR!!- activation!!BR!!- notes!!BR!!- alt/else
end note
@enduml

name: Use Case Diagram
advanced_puml:
@startuml
title Use Case Diagram (advanced features)
left to right direction
skinparam backgroundColor #FFFFFF
skinparam usecase {
  BorderColor #24292F
  BackgroundColor #F6F8FA
  ArrowColor #57606A
}
skinparam actor {
  BorderColor #24292F
  BackgroundColor #EAEEF2
}

actor Customer as C
actor "Support Agent" as SA
actor "Payment Gateway" as PG

rectangle "Commerce Platform" as SYS #F6F8FA {
  (Browse Catalog) as UC1
  (Manage Cart) as UC2
  (Checkout) as UC3
  (Authorize Payment) as UC4
  (Refund Order) as UC5

  UC3 ..> UC2 : <<include>>
  UC3 ..> UC4 : <<include>>
  UC5 ..> (Validate Eligibility) : <<include>>
}

C --> UC1
C --> UC2
C --> UC3
SA --> UC5
UC4 --> PG

note bottom of SYS #FFF8C5
  Demonstrates:!!BR!!- directions!!BR!!- skinparam styling!!BR!!- include!!BR!!- external actor link
end note
@enduml

name: Class Diagram
Activity Diagram (beta)
Component Diagram
State Diagram
simple_puml:
@startuml
[*] --> Idle
Idle --> Processing : start
Processing --> Idle : finish
Processing --> Error : fail
Error --> Idle : reset
@enduml
advanced_puml:
@startuml
title State Diagram (advanced features)
skinparam backgroundColor #FFFFFF
skinparam state {
  BorderColor #24292F
  BackgroundColor #F6F8FA
  ArrowColor #1F6FEB
}

[*] --> Draft

state Draft #E7F5FF {
  [*] --> Editing
  Editing --> Ready : validate ok
  Ready --> Editing : edit
}

Draft --> Submitted : submit
Submitted --> Paid : payment ok
Submitted --> Cancelled : cancel

state Paid {
  [*] --> AwaitingFulfillment
  AwaitingFulfillment --> Shipped : fulfill
  Shipped --> Delivered : deliver
}

state Cancelled #FFE3E6
state Delivered #EAFBE7

note right of Submitted #FFF8C5
  Demonstrates:!!BR!!- nested states!!BR!!- colored states!!BR!!- labels
end note
@enduml

name: Object Diagram
Deployment Diagram
Timing Diagram
advanced_puml:
@startuml
concise "Client" as Client
concise "Server" as Server
concise "Response freshness" as Cache

Server is idle
Client is idle

@Client
0 is send
Client -> Server@+25 : GET
+25 is await
+75 is recv
+25 is idle
+25 is send
Client -> Server@+25 : GET!!BR!!If-Modified-Since: 150
+25 is await
+50 is recv
+25 is idle
@100 <-> @275 : no need to re-request from server

@Server
25 is recv
+25 is work
+25 is send
Server -> Client@+25 : 200 OK!!BR!!Expires: 275
+25 is idle
+75 is recv
+25 is send
Server -> Client@+25 : 304 Not Modified
+25 is idle

@Cache
75 is fresh
+200 is stale
@enduml

name: nwdiag Network Diagram
SALT Diagram
ArchiMate Diagram
simple_puml:
@startuml
!define Junction_Or circle #black
!define Junction_And circle #whitesmoke

Junction_And JunctionAnd
Junction_Or JunctionOr

archimate #Technology "VPN Server" as vpnServerA <<technology-device>>

rectangle GO #lightgreen
rectangle STOP #red
rectangle WAIT #orange
GO -up-> JunctionOr
STOP -up-> JunctionOr
STOP -down-> JunctionAnd
WAIT -down-> JunctionAnd
@enduml
advanced_puml:
@startuml
skinparam rectangle<<behavior>> {
	roundCorner 25
}
sprite $bProcess jar:archimate/business-process
sprite $aService jar:archimate/application-service
sprite $aComponent jar:archimate/application-component

rectangle "Handle claim"  as HC <<$bProcess>><<behavior>> #Business
rectangle "Capture Information"  as CI <<$bProcess>><<behavior>> #Business
rectangle "Notify!!BR!!Additional Stakeholders" as NAS <<$bProcess>><<behavior>> #Business
rectangle "Validate" as V <<$bProcess>><<behavior>> #Business
rectangle "Investigate" as I <<$bProcess>><<behavior>> #Business
rectangle "Pay" as P <<$bProcess>><<behavior>> #Business

HC *-down- CI
HC *-down- NAS
HC *-down- V
HC *-down- I
HC *-down- P

CI -right->> NAS
NAS -right->> V
V -right->> I
I -right->> P

rectangle "Scanning" as scanning <<$aService>><<behavior>> #Application
rectangle "Customer administration" as customerAdministration <<$aService>><<behavior>> #Application
rectangle "Claims administration" as claimsAdministration <<$aService>><<behavior>> #Application
rectangle Printing <<$aService>><<behavior>> #Application
rectangle Payment <<$aService>><<behavior>> #Application

scanning -up-> CI
customerAdministration  -up-> CI
claimsAdministration -up-> NAS
claimsAdministration -up-> V
claimsAdministration -up-> I
Payment -up-> P

Printing -up-> V
Printing -up-> P

rectangle "Document!!BR!!Management!!BR!!System" as DMS <<$aComponent>> #Application
rectangle "General!!BR!!CRM!!BR!!System" as CRM <<$aComponent>>  #Application
rectangle "Home & Away!!BR!!Policy!!BR!!Administration" as HAPA <<$aComponent>> #Application
rectangle "Home & Away!!BR!!Financial!!BR!!Administration" as HFPA <<$aComponent>>  #Application

DMS .up.|> scanning
DMS .up.|> Printing
CRM .up.|> customerAdministration
HAPA .up.|> claimsAdministration
HFPA .up.|> Payment

legend left
Example from the "Archisurance case study" (OpenGroup).!!BR!!See!!BR!!====!!BR!!<$bProcess> :business process!!BR!!====!!BR!!<$aService> : application service!!BR!!====!!BR!!<$aComponent> : application component
endlegend
@enduml

name: Gantt Diagram
advanced_puml:
@startgantt
title Gantt (advanced features)
Project starts 2025-01-01

[Discovery] lasts 3 days
[Design] lasts 5 days
[Build] lasts 10 days
[QA] lasts 4 days
[Release] lasts 1 day

[Design] starts at [Discovery]'s end
[Build] starts at [Design]'s end
[QA] starts at [Build]'s end
[Release] starts at [QA]'s end

-- Milestones --
[Kickoff] happens at 2025-01-01
[Go Live] happens at [Release]'s end

note bottom
  Demonstrates:!!BR!!- title!!BR!!- dependencies!!BR!!- milestones!!BR!!- phases
end note
@endgantt

name: JSON Diagram
YAML Diagram
simple_puml:
@startyaml
doe: "a deer, a female deer"
ray: "a drop of golden sun"
pi: 3.14159
xmas: true
french-hens: 3
calling-birds:
  - huey
  - dewey
  - louie
  - fred
xmas-fifth-day:
  calling-birds: four
  french-hens: 3
  golden-rings: 5
  partridges:
    count: 1
    location: "a pear tree"
  turtle-doves: two
@endyaml
advanced_puml:
@startyaml
<style>
    .h1 {
      BackGroundColor green
      FontColor white
      FontStyle italic
    }
    .h2 {
      BackGroundColor red
      FontColor white
      FontStyle italic
    }
</style>
#highlight "french-hens" <<h1>>
#highlight "xmas-fifth-day" / "partridges" <<h2>>

doe: "a deer, a female deer"
ray: "a drop of golden sun"
pi: 3.14159
xmas: true
french-hens: 3
calling-birds:
  - huey
  - dewey
  - louie
  - fred
xmas-fifth-day:
  calling-birds: four
  french-hens: 3
  golden-rings: 5
  partridges:
    count: 1
    location: "a pear tree"
  turtle-doves: two
@endyaml
